# Windows Files

## Reset Quick Access in Windows

1. start cmd prompt with admin rights
2. run: del /F /Q %APPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\Recent\AutomaticDestinations\*

# Windows Shortcuts

[Microsoft Keyboard shortcuts](https://www.microsoft.com/accessories/en-us/support/hardware-tips-and-tricks)

## Launch Programs Pinned to Task Bar

Can pin 1 through 0 programs to windows task bar, and access quickly via **win + 1** for the first pinned program for example.

But how to access the 11th pinned program?

**Info**:
